description: ELSYS is a Swedish company specializing in the development and production of wireless sensors for smart buildings, cities, and industries. Their product range includes devices for indoor climate monitoring, energy efficiency, and workplace management. All sensors are manufactured in the EU, ensuring high-quality standards and a reduced environmental footprint. ELSYSâ€™s notable products include the ELT-2, a versatile LoRaWAN device for measuring analog or digital signals, and the ELT Ultrasonic sensor, which monitors distance, temperature, humidity, and atmospheric pressure. Committed to innovative and reliable solutions, ELSYS empowers smart environments worldwide.
